channel.title: Depth Charge - Devoid of Joy (experimental)
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/devoidofjoy/depth-charge
Just experimenting with bass automations. Thought it came out interesting. Slow bpm’s simple drum loops and minimal instruments (5 all together).
